Description: Hideaway is at a turning point. Something will give way soon.
LevelDescriptionText: 100|The dwellers choose to believe that all's well~110|The dwellers refuse the truth~120|The dwellers are maintaining their belief that all's well~130|The dwellers don't want to acknowledge the truth~140|The dwellers are struggling to deny the truth~160|The dwellers cannot ignore the truth~150|The dwellers are beginning to accept the truth
Name: Hideaway: Deciding the Future of Hideaway
